member.name: T:DebugTools.Enums.SkipProperty
member.summary: Used to adjust the search settings for the inspector

member.name: F:DebugTools.Enums.SkipProperty.None
member.summary: Does not skip any child controls.

member.name: F:DebugTools.Enums.SkipProperty.Invisible
member.summary: Skips invisible child controls.

member.name: F:DebugTools.Enums.SkipProperty.Disabled
member.summary: Skips disabled child controls.

member.name: F:DebugTools.Enums.SkipProperty.Transparent
member.summary: Skips transparent child controls.

member.name: T:DebugTools.Enums.DocumentOutlineLayout
member.summary: Used to layout the document outline.

member.name: F:DebugTools.Enums.DocumentOutlineLayout.None
member.summary: Displays only the name of the control

member.name: F:DebugTools.Enums.DocumentOutlineLayout.Short
member.summary: Displays the name and the type of the control

member.name: F:DebugTools.Enums.DocumentOutlineLayout.Full
member.summary: Displays the name and the fullname of the control

summary.para: This component can be used to inspect controls in Windows Forms.
Press "Ctrl + F8" to open the Control View. Hold down "Alt" and move the mouse over the control you want to inspect.
NB: The keys can be changed be the properties "OpenControlViewKey" and "ActivateKey"

member.name: P:DebugTools.Tools.Inspector.ControlView
member.summary: Show the information about the control.

member.name: P:DebugTools.Tools.Inspector.InspectKey
member.summary: Is used to activate the inspector.

member.name: P:DebugTools.Tools.Inspector.OpenControlViewKey
member.summary: Is used to open the Control View.

member.name: P:DebugTools.Tools.Inspector.IgnoreTypes
member.summary: The inspector will ignore these types.

member.name: P:DebugTools.Tools.Inspector.SkipProperties
member.summary: Specifies which control settings to skip.

summary.para: This component can be used to inspect controls in Windows Forms.
Press "Ctrl + F8" to open the Control View. Hold down "Alt" and move the mouse over the control you want to inspect.
NB: The keys can be changed be the properties "OpenControlViewKey" and "ActivateKey"
